meanings.sent1: She became overemotional when she saw the puppy.
meanings.sent2: He is often overemotional during sad movies.
meanings.sent3: The overemotional reaction to spilling milk made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her overemotional outburst was like a storm of tears.
meanings.sent5: The overemotional farewell left a lasting impression on him.

meanings.definition: characterized by excessive emotion or sensitivity
meanings.sent1: The overemotional teenager cried at the slightest provocation.
meanings.sent2: She found it hard to control her overemotional responses.
meanings.sent3: His overemotional nature made him the perfect actor for the role.
meanings.sent4: The overemotional atmosphere in the room was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The overemotional speech moved the audience to tears.
